header.title: Choose Your Review Level
header.description: Get your estate planning documents reviewed by licensed attorneys with our tiered service levels. Each review includes legal compliance verification and personalized recommendations.

recommendation.title: Recommended for Your Family
recommendation.description: Based on your family situation ({{familyDescription}}), we recommend the {{tierName}} for optimal protection.

basic.name: Basic Review
basic.description: Essential legal review for straightforward documents

certified.name: Certified Review
certified.description: Premium service with legal certification and ongoing support

documentStructureReview.name: Document Structure Review
documentStructureReview.description: Check overall document organization and completeness

legalComplianceCheck.name: Legal Compliance Check
legalComplianceCheck.description: Verify compliance with state laws and regulations

advancedErrorDetection.name: Advanced Error Detection
advancedErrorDetection.description: Deep analysis for subtle issues and improvements

comprehensiveAnalysis.name: Comprehensive Analysis
comprehensiveAnalysis.description: Complete legal, tax, and strategic analysis

writtenSummary.name: Written Summary
writtenSummary.description: Brief summary of findings and recommendations

certifiedLegalOpinion.name: Certified Legal Opinion
certifiedLegalOpinion.description: Formal legal opinion with professional certification

followUpCall.name: Follow-up Call
followUpCall.description: One 15-minute follow-up call to discuss findings

priorityProcessing.name: Priority Processing
priorityProcessing.description: Fast-track your review ahead of regular queue

priorityProcessingDedicated.name: Priority Processing
priorityProcessingDedicated.description: Highest priority processing with dedicated attorney

certified: Peace of mind with formal certification

licensedAttorneys.title: Licensed Attorneys
licensedAttorneys.description: All reviews conducted by licensed, verified attorneys with estate planning expertise

qualityGuaranteed.title: Quality Guaranteed
qualityGuaranteed.description: 100% satisfaction guarantee with unlimited revisions on recommendations

familyFocused.title: Family Focused
familyFocused.description: Specialized in family protection with personalized recommendations for your situation
